tool_description: an API  showing all the latest news all over the world
name: Climate Live changes and crisis
title: Climate Live changes and crisis

api_list.name: Get individual newspaper sources all over the world
api_list.description: Get news about climate change from a specific one.......
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-live-changes-and-crisis.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-live-changes-and-crisis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
